verses.padam: (Padam) cittam| satAMqnEnEti# saM - tAqnEna|̍ Bavam| yaknA| rudram| tanimnA|̍ paśupatimiti# paśu - pati̱m| sthUlahRudayEnEti# sthUla - hRudayEna|̍ agnim| hRudayEna|̍ rudram| lOhitEna|̍ śarvam| matasnAByAm|̍ mahAqdEvamiti# mahA - dEvam| antaH pA̱rśvEnEtyantaH - pAqrśvEna| OśhiśhThahanamityOśhiśhTha̍ - hana̱m| śi~ggInikOśyA̱ByAqmiti# śi~ggI - nikOśyA̱ByAm| | 37 (18)
verses.samhita: cittaṃ santAqnEna̍# BavaM ~MyaknA rudraM tanimnA̍ paśupatiṅ# sthUlahRudayEnAqgniṃ hRudayEna̍ rudraM ~MlOhitEna̍ śarvaM matasnAByAM̍ mahAdEva-mantaHpA̱rśvEnauśhiśhThahanaṃ# śi~ggInikOśyA̱ByAM| | 37

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|̍ tiśhTha| vRutrahanniti# vRutra - hann| ratha̱m| yuktA| tE| brahmaṇA|̍ harI iti|̍ | arvAqcIna̱m| sviti|̍ tE| manaH|̍ grAvA̱| kRuṇOtu| vagnunA̱| | upayAqmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAqma̍ - gRuhItaH| asi| indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| EśhaH| tE| yOniH|̍ indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| | 38 (26) (A tiśhTa̍ - śhaTviṃśatiH)̍ (A37)
verses.samhita: A tiśhTha̍ vRutrahan rathaM̍ ~MyuktA tE brahmaṇAq̍ harI̱| arvAqcInaṃq su tE manO grAvA# kRuṇOtu vagnunA̱| | upayAqmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA śhODaśina# Eśha tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA śhODaśinE̱| | 38 (A tiśhTa-śhaTviṃ̍śatiH)̍ (A37)

verses.padam: (Padam) indra̱m| it| harI iti|̍ vahataH| apratidhRuśhTaśavasamityapra̍tidhRuśhTa̍ - śavasam| RuśhIṇAm|̍ ca| stutIH| upEti|̍ yajñam| ca| mAnuśhAṇAm|̍ | upayAqmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAqma̍ - gRuhItaH| asi| indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| EśhaH| tE| yOniH|̍ indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| | 39 (23) (indramit - trayOviṃśatiH)̍ (A38)
verses.samhita: indramiddharI# vahatO-&pratidhRuśhTaśavasa-mRuśhI̍ṇAM̍ ca stutIrupa# yajñaM ca mAnuśhAṇAM|̍ | upayAqmagRuhItO-&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA śhODaśina# Eśha tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA śhODaśinE̱| | 39 (indramit-trayOviṃśatiH)̍ (A38)

verses.padam: (Padam) asAvi|̍ sOmaH|̍ indra| tE| śaviśhTha|̍ dhRuśhṇO| Eti|̍ gahi| | Eti|̍ tvAq| pRuṇak^^tu| indriyam| rajaH|̍ sUrya̱m| na| raśmiBiriti# raśmi - BiH| | upayAqmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAqma̍ - gRuhItaH| asi| indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| EśhaH| tE| yOniH|̍ indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| | 40 (27) (asAvi̍ - saptaviṃśatiH)̍ (A39)
verses.samhita: asAvi̍ sOma# indra tE śaviśhTha̍ dhRuśhṇavA gahi|̍ A tvA# pRuṇaktvindriyaṃ rajaH sUryaM na raśmiBiH|̍ | upayAqmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA śhODaśina# Eśha tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA śhODaśinE̱| | 40 (asAvi-saptaviṃ̍śatiH)̍ (A39)

verses.padam: (Padam) sarvasya|̍ pratiśIvarIti# prati - śIvarI|̍ BUmiH|̍ tvAq| upastha ityupa - sthE| Eti|̍ adhita| | syOnA| asmai| suśhadEti# su - sadA̱| Bava| yacCa|̍ asmai| śarma|̍ saprathAq iti# sa-prathA̱H| | upayAqmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAqma̍ - gRuhItaH| asi| indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| EśhaH| tE| yOniH|̍ indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| | 41 (26) (sarvasya̍ śhaDviṃśatiH)̍ (A40)
verses.samhita: sarvasya̍ pratiśIvarI̍ BUmistvOpastha̍ A&dhita|̍ syOnA&smai# suśhadA# Bava yacCA̱&smai śarma# saprathA̱H| | upayAqmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA śhODaśina# Eśha tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA śhODaśinE̱| | 41 (sarvasya̍ śhaDviṃśatiH)̍ (A40)

verses.padam: (Padam) mahAn| indraH|̍ vajrabAhuriti̍ vajra# - bAqhuH| śhODaśI| śarma|̍ yacCatu| | svasti| naH| maGavEti# maGa - vAq| karOtu| hantu|̍ pAqpmAna̱m| yaH| asmAn| dvEśhTi|̍ | upayAqmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAqma̍ - gRuhItaH| asi| indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| EśhaH| tE| yOniH|̍ indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| | 42 (26) (mahAn - śhaDviṃśatiH)̍ (A41)
verses.samhita: mahAṃ indrO vajrabAhuH̍ śhODaśI śarma# yacCatu| svasti nO# maGavA# karOtu hantu# pAqpmAnaM ~MyO̱&smAn dvEśhTi|̍ | upayAqmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA śhODaśina# Eśha tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA śhODaśinE̱| | 42 (mahAn-śhaDviṃśatiH)̍ (A41)

verses.padam: (Padam) sajOśhAq iti# sa - jOśhA̱H| indra| sagaṇa̍ iti sa - gaṇaH| marudBiriti# marut - BiH| sOma̱m| piba| vRutrahanniti# vRutra - hann| śUra| vidvAn| | jahi| śatrUn|̍ apEti|̍ mRudhaH|̍ nudasva| atha|̍ aBayam|̍ kRuṇuhi| viśvataH|̍ naH| | upayAqmagRuhIta̍ ityupayAqma̍ - gRuhItaH| asi| indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| EśhaH| tE| yOniH|̍ indrAya|̍ tvAq| śhODaśinE̱| | 43 (30) (sajOśhA̱ - triṃqśat) (A42)
verses.samhita: sajOśhA# indra sagaṇO̍ marudBiH sOmaM̍ piba vRutraha~jCUra vidvAn| jahi śatrUṃq rapa mRudhO# nudasvA&thABayaM̍ kRuṇuhi viśvatO# naH| | upayAqmagRuhItO&sIndrA̍ya̍ tvA śhODaśina# Eśha tE yOnirindrAya̍ tvA śhODaśinE̱| | 43 (sajOśhA̱H-triṃqśat) (A42)

verses.padam: (Padam) uditi|̍ u| tyam| jAqtavEdasamiti̍# jAqta - vEdasam| dEvam| vahanti| kEtavaH|̍ | dRuśE| viśvAya|̍ sUrya̱m| | citram| dEvAnA̱m| uditi|̍ agAqt| anIkam|̍ cakśhuH|̍ mitrasya|̍ varuṇasya|̍ agnEH| | aiti|̍ aprAqH| dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI| antarikśham|̍ sUryaH|̍ AqtmA| jagataH|̍ tasthuśhaH|̍ ca| | agnE̱| naya|̍ supathEti# su - pathA̱| rAqyE| asmAn| viśvAni|̍ dEva| vayunAni|̍ vidvAn| | yuyOdhi| asmat| juhurAqṇam| EnaH|̍ BUyiśhThAm|̍ tE| namauktimiti̍ namaH̍ - uktim| vidhEma| | diva̱m| gacCa| suvaH|̍ pata| rUpEṇa|̍ 44 (50)
verses.samhita: udu tyaM jAqtavEdasaM̍ dEvaM ~Mvahanti̍ kEtavaH|̍ dRuśE viśvAya̍ sUrya̱M| | citraM dEvAnAq-mudagAqdanI̍kaM̍ cakśhur̍ mitrasya varuṇasyAq&gnEH|̍ A&prAq dyAvApRuthivI̍ antarikśhaṃq̍ sUrya# AqtmA jagatastasthuśha̍śca|̍ | agnE naya# supathA# rAqyE asmAn. viśvAni̍ dEva vayunAni̍ vidvAn| yuyOddhyasma-jju̍hurAqṇa̍ mEnO BUyiśhThAM̍ tE namauktiM̍ vidhEma| | divaM̍ gacCa suvaH̍ pata rUpEṇa# - [ ] 44

verses.padam: (Padam) vaH| rUpam| aBi| Eti|̍ Emi| vayasA|̍ vayaH|̍ | tuthaH| vaH| viśvavEdAq̍ iti# viśva - vEdAqH| vIti|̍ Bajatu| vaṛ śhiśhThE|̍ adhIti|̍ nAkE̱| | Etat| tE| agnE| rAdhaH|̍ Eti|̍ Eti| sOmacyutamiti̍ sOma# - cyutam| tat| mitrasya|̍ pathA| naya| Rutasya|̍ pathA| prEti|̍ ita| candradakśhiṇAq̍ iti# candra - dakśhiṇAqH| yajñasya|̍ pathA| suvitA| nayantIH|̍ brAqhmaṇam| adya| rAqddhyAqsam| Ruśhi̱m| Aqṛ qśhEyam| pitRumantamiti# pitRu - manta̱m| paitRumatyamiti# paitRu - matyam| sudhAtudakśhiṇamiti̍# sudhAtu# - dakśhiṇam| vIti|̍ suvaH|̍ paśya|̍ vIti|̍ antarikśham|̍ yatasva|̍ sadasyai̱H ( )| asmaddA̱trAq ityasmat - dAqtrAqH| dEvatrEti# dEva - trA| gacCata| madhumatIriti̍ madhu# - matIH| pradAqtAramiti# pra - dAqtAra̱m| Eti|̍ viśata| anavahAqyEtyana̍va̍ - hAqya| asmAn| dEvayAnEnEti# dEva - yAnEna|̍ pathA| ita| sukRutAqmiti# su - kRutA̱m| lOkE| sIdata| tat| naH| saṅqskRutam| | 45 (68)
verses.samhita: vO rUpamaByaimi vayasAq̍ vayaH|̍ tuthO vO# viśvavEdAq̍ vi Bajatu̍ vaṛ śhiśhThE̍ adhi nAkE̱| | EtattE# agnE rAdha aiti sOmacyutaM̍ tanmitrasya# pathA nayartasya̍# pathA prEta# candradakśhiṇA̍ yajñasya# pathA suvitA̍ nayantIr̍ brAhmaṇamadya rA̱ddhyAsamRuśhimAṛ̍ śhEyaM pitRumanta̍M̍ paitRumatyaṃ sudhAtudakśhiṇaM̍ ~Mvi suvaH paśya vyantari̍kśhaM̍ ~Myatasva̍ sadasyai# ( ) rasmaddA̱trA dEvatrA gacCata̍ madhumatIH̍ pradAqtAramA viśatA&na̍vahAyAq&smAn̍ dEvayAnE̍na̍ pathEta# sukRutA̱M ~MlOkE sIdata̍ tannaH̍ saṅskRutaM| | 45

verses.padam: (Padam) dhatA| rAqtiH| savitA| idam| juśhantAqm| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| nidhipatiriti# nidhi - patiH|̍ naH| agniH| | tvaśhTA̱| viśhṇuH|̍ prajayEti# pra - jayA̱| saṃqrarAqṇa iti# saM-rarAqṇaH| yajamAnAya|̍ draviṇam|̍ dadhAqtu| | samiti|̍ indra| naH| manasA|̍ nEśhi| gOBiH|̍ samiti|̍ sUriBiriti# sUri - BiH| maGavanniti# maGa - vann| samiti|̍ svastyA| | samiti|̍ brahmaṇA|̍ dEvakRutamiti̍# dEva - kRutam| yat| asti|̍ samiti|̍ dEvAnA̱m| sumatyEti# su - matyA| yajñiyAnAm|̍ | samiti|̍ varcasA|̍ payasA|̍ samiti|̍ tanUBiH|̍ aganmahi|̍ manasA|̍ samiti|̍ śivEna|̍ | tvaśhTA̱| naH| atra|̍ varivaH|̍ kRuṇOtu| 46 (50)
verses.samhita: dhAqtA rAqtiH savitEdaM̍ juśhantAM̍ prajApatir̍ nidhipatirnO̍ agniH| tvaśhTAq viśhṇuH̍ prajayA# saṃrarAqṇO yajamAnAya̍ draviṇaM̍ dadhAtu| | samindra̍ ṇO manasA̍ nEśhi gOBiH saṃ sUriBirmaGavanth̍ saṅ svastyA| saM brahmaṇA̍ dEvakRutaM̍ ~Myadasti saM dEvAnAṃ# sumatyA yajñiyAnAM|̍ | saM ~MvarcasAq̍ payasAq̍ saM tanUBi-raganmahi̍ manasAq̍ saṃ śivEna|̍ | tvaśhTA# nO atra varivaH̍ kRuṇO - [ ] 46

verses.padam: (Padam) anviti|̍ mAqrśhTu| tanuvaH|̍ yat| viliśhTamiti̍ vi - liśhTam| | yat| adya| tvAq| prayatIti# pra - yati| yajñE| asminn| agnE̱| hOtAram|̍ avRuṇImahi|̍ iha| | Rudhak|̍ ayAqT| Rudhak|̍ uta| aśamiśhThAH|̍ prajAqnanniti# pra - jAqnann| yajñam| upEti|̍ yAqhi| vidvAn| | svagEti# sva - gA| vaH| dEvAqH| sadanam|̍ akarma| yE| AqjagmEtyA̱ - jagma| savanA|̍ idam| juśhAqṇAH| | jakśhivAṃsaH|̍ papivAṃsaH|̍ ca| viśvE̱| asmE iti|̍ dhatta| vasavaH| vasUni|̍ | yAn| Eti|̍ avahaH|̍ uśataH| dEva| dEvAn| tAn| 47 (50)
verses.samhita: tvanu# mArśhTu tanuvO yadviliśhTaM|̍ | yadadya tvA̱ prayati yajñE asminnagnE hOtAramavRu̍ṇImahIha|̍ RudhagayAqDRudha̍gutA&śa̍miśhThAH̍ prajAqnan. yajñamupa# yAhi vidvAn| | svagA vO# dEvAqH sadanamakarma̍ ya Ajagma̍ savanEdaM̍ juśhAqṇAH|̍ jakśhivAṃsaH̍ papivAṃsaśca̍ viśvE&smE dhatta̍ vasavO vasUni|̍ | yAnA&vaha̍ uśatO dEva̍ dEvAn tAn-[ ] 47

verses.padam: (Padam) prEti|̍ Iraya| svE| agnE| sadhastha iti# sadha - sthE| | vahamAnAH|̍ BaramAṇAH|̍ havIṃśhi|̍ vasu̱m| Garmam| diva̱m| Eti|̍ tiśhThata| anu|̍ | yajña|̍ yajñam| gacCa| yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim| gacCa| svAm| yOni̱m| gacCa| svAhA̱| EśhaH| tE| yajñaH| yajñapata iti# yajña - patE| sahasU̱ktavAka iti# sahasa̱kta - vAqkaH| suvIra iti# su - vIraH|̍ svAhA̱| dEvA̱H| gAqtuvida iti# gAtu - vidaH| gAqtum| vittvA| gAqtum| ita| manasaH|̍ patE| imam| naH| dEva| dEvEśhu|̍ yajñam| svAhA̱| vAqci| svAhA̱| vAtE̱| dhAqH| | 48 (48) (kRuṇOtu - tAna - śhTAcatvAriṃśacca̍ )(A44 )
verses.samhita: prEraya̍ svE agnE̍ sadhasthE̱| vahamAnAq̍ BaramAṇA̍ havIṃśhi vasuM̍ GarmaM divamA tiśhThatAnu̍|̍ yajña# yajñaM gacCa̍ yajñapatiM̍ gacCa svAM ~MyOniM̍ gacCa svAhaiśha tE# yajñO yajñapatE̍ sahasU̱ktavAkaH suvIraH svAhAq dEvA# gAtuvidO gAqtuM ~MvittvA gAqtumita̍ manasaspata̍ imaM nO# dEva dEvEśhu# yajñaṅ svAhA# vAqci svAhAq vAtE# dhAH| | 48 (kRuṇOtu-tAna-śhTAcatvAriṃśacca̍ ) (A44)

verses.padam: (Padam) urum| hi| rAjA̱| varuṇaH|̍ cakAra|̍ sUryAya|̍ panthA̱m| anvEtavA̍ ityanu# - Etavai| u| | apadE̱| pAdA̱| pratidhAtava̍ iti prati-dhAqtavE|̍ akaH| uta| apavaktEtyapa̍ - vaktA| hRudayAqvidha iti# hRudaya - vidhaH|̍ cit| | śatam| tE| rAqjann| BiśhajaH|̍ sahasra̱m| urvI| gaBIMqrA| sumatiriti# su - matiH| tE| astu| | bAdhasva|̍ dvEśhaH|̍ niṛ Rutimiti̍ niH - Rutim| parAqcaiH| kRutam| cit| EnaH|̍ prEti|̍ mumugdhi| asmat| | aBiśhThita̍ ityaBi - sthitaH| varuṇasya|̍ pAśaH|̍ agnEH| anIkam|̍ apaH| Eti|̍ vivEśa| | apA̱m| napAqt| pratirakśhanniti# prati - rakśhann|̍ asurya̱m| damEdama̍ iti damE̱ - damE| 49 (50)
verses.samhita: uruṃ hi rAjAq varuṇaścakAra̍ sUryAya̍ panthAq-manvEtavA̍ u|̍ apadE pAdAq pratidhAtavE-&karutA-&pa̍vaktA̍ hRudayAqvidha̍ścit|̍ | śataM tE# rAjan BiśhajaH̍ sahasramurvI̍ gaMBIrA̍ sumatiśhTE̍# astu| bAdhasva̍ dvEśhO niṛ RutiM̍ parAqcaiH kRutaM cidEnaH pra mumugddhyasmat|̍ | aBiśhThitO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśO&gnEranIkamapa̍ A vivEśa|̍ apA̱nnapAt pratirakśhannasurya̍M̍ damEdamE̍ - [ ] 49

verses.padam: (Padam) samidhamiti# saM - idha̱m| yakśhi| agnE| | pratIti|̍ tE| jihvA| GRutam| uditi|̍ caraṇyEt| samudrE| tE| hRudayam|̍ aPsvityap̍ - su| antaH| | samiti|̍ tvAq| viśantu| OśhadhIH|̍ uta| ApaH|̍ yajñasya|̍ tvAq| yajñapata iti# yajña - patE| havirBiriti# haviH - BiH| | sUktavAqka iti# sUkta - vAqkE| namOvAqka iti# namaH - vAqkE| vidhEma| avaBRuthEtyava̍# - BRutha| nica~gkuṇEti# ni - ca~gkuṇa| nicEruriti# ni - cEruH| asi| nica~gkuṇEti# ni - ca~gkuṇa| avEti|̍ dEvaiH| dEvakRutamiti̍# dEva - kRutam| EnaH|̍ ayAqT| avEti|̍ martyai̱H| martyakRutamiti̍ martya# - kRutam| urOH| Eti|̍ naH| dEva| riśhaH| pAqhi| sumitrA iti# su - mitrAH| naH| ApaH|̍ OśhadhayaH|̍ 50 (50)
verses.samhita: samidhaM̍ ~MyakśhyagnE| | prati# tE jihvA GRutamuccaraṇyEth̍ samudrE tE hRudayamaPsva̍ntaH|̍ saM tvA# viśantvOśhadhI-rutA&&pO̍# yajñasya# tvA yajñapatE havirBiH|̍ | sUktavAqkE namOvAqkE̍ vidhEmA&va̍BRutha̍ nica~gkuṇa nicErurasi̍ nica~gkuṇA&va# dEvair dEvakRutamEnO̍&yAqDava̍ martyair martyakRutamurOrA̍ nO# dEva riśhaspAhi̍ sumitrA na Apa OśhadhayaH̍ - [ ] 50

verses.padam: (Padam) santu| durmitrA iti# duH-mitrAH| tasmai̱| BUyAqsuH| yaH| asmAn| dvEśhTi|̍ yam| ca| vayam| dviśhmaH| dEvI̱H| AqpaH| EśhaH| vaH| garBaH|̍ tam| vaH| suprItamiti̍ su - prItam| suBRutamiti̍ su - BRutam| akarma| dEvEśhu|̍ naH| sukRuta iti# su-kRutaH|̍ brUtAqt| pratiyuta̍ iti prati# - yutaH| varuṇasya|̍ pAśaH|̍ pratyasta̍ iti prati# - astaH| varuṇasya|̍ pAśaH|̍ EdhaH|̍ asi| EdhiśhImahi|̍ samiditi# sam - it| asi| tEjaH|̍ asi| tEjaH|̍ mayi|̍ dhEha| apaH| anviti|̍ acAqriśham| rasEna|̍ samiti|̍ asRukśhmahi| payasvAn|̍ agnE| Eti# ( )| agamam| tam| mAq| samiti|̍ sRuja| varcasA|̍ | 51 (56)
verses.samhita: santu durmitrAstasmai# BUyAsur yO̱&smAn dvEśhTi yaM ca# vayaM dviśhmO dEvIrApa̍ Eśha vO garBastaM ~MvaH suprItaṃq̍ suBRuta-makarma̍ dEvEśhu# naH sukRutO̱ brUtAqt pratiyutO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśaH pratyastO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśa EdhO̱&syEdhiśhImahi# samidasi̍ tEjO&si̍ tEjO mayi# dhEhyapO anvacAriśhaṃq̍ rasEna̍ samasRukśhmahi|̍ payasvAṃ̍ agna A ( ) &gamaM̍ taM mAq saṃ sRuja̍ varcasA|̍ | 51

verses.padam: (Padam) yaH| tvAq| hRudA| kIriṇA̱| manyamAnaH|̍ amartyam|̍ martyaH|̍ jOhavImi|̍ | jAtavEda̍ iti jAta# - vEdaH| yaśaH|̍ asmAsu|̍ dhEhi| prajABiriti# pra - jABiH|̍ agnE| amRutatvamityamRuta̍ - tvam| aśyAqm| | yasmai̱| tvam| sukRuta iti# su - kRutE̱| jAqtavEda iti# jAta-vEdaH| u| lOkam| agnE| kRuṇavaH|̍ syOnam| | aśvina̱m| saH| putriṇa̱m| vIravantamiti̍# vIra - vantam| gOmantamiti̍ gO - mantam| rayim| naśatE| svasti| | tvE iti|̍ sviti|̍ putra| śavasaH| avRutrann|̍ kAmakAtaya̍ iti kAma# - kAqtayaH| | na| tvAm| indra| atIti|̍ ricyatE| | uktha^^uktha̍ ityukthE - ukthE| sOmaH|̍ indra̱m| mamAqda| nIthEnItha̍ iti# nIthE - nIthE| maGavAnamiti̍# maGa - vAqnam| 52 (50)
verses.samhita: yastvA# hRudA kIriṇAq manyamAqnO̍ &martyaM̍ martyO jOhavImi|̍ jAtavEdO̍ yaśO# asmAsu# dhEhi prajABiragnE̍ amRutatvamaśyAM|̍ | yasmai tvaṃ sukRutE# jAtavEda u lOkamagnE̍ kRuṇavaH̍ syOnaM| aśvinaṃq sa putriṇaM̍ vIravantaM̍ gOmantaṃ̍ rayiM naśatE̍ svasti| | tvE su putra̍ śavasO&vRutran̍ kAmakAtayaH|̍ na tvAmindrAti# ricyatE| | ukthaukthE̍ sOma indraM̍ mamAda nIthEnIthE̍ maGavAnaṃ̍ - [ ] 52

verses.padam: (Padam) sutAsaH|̍ | yat| Im| sabAdha iti# sa - bAdhaH|̍ pitara̱m| na| putrAH| samAqnadakśhAq̍ iti# samAqna-dakśhAqH| avasE|̍ havantE|̍ | agnE̱| rasEna|̍ tEjasA|̍ jAtavEda̍ iti jAta# - vEdaH| vIti|̍ rOcasE| | rakśhOhEti# rakśhaH - hA| amIvacAtana̍ ityamIva̍ - cAtanaH|̍ | apaH| anviti|̍ acAqriśham| rasEna|̍ samiti|̍ asRukśhmahi| | payasvAn|̍ agnE| Eti|̍ agamam| tam| mAq| samiti|̍ sRuja| varcasA|̍ | vasuH|̍ vasupatiriti̍ vasu# - patiH| hika̱m| asi|̍ agnE| viBAvasuriti̍# viBA - vasuH| | syAma|̍ tE| sumatAviti# su-matau| api|̍ | tvAm| agnE| vasupatimiti̍ vasu# - patim| vasUnAm|̍ aBi| prEti|̍ mandE| 53 (50)
verses.samhita: sutAsaH|̍ yadIṃ# sabAdhaH̍ pitaraM na putrAH samAqnada̍kśhAq̍ avasE̍ havantE|̍ | agnE rasEna̍ tEjasAq̍ jAtavEdO̍ vi rOcasE|̍ rakśhOhA&mIvacAta̍naH|̍ | apO anvacAriśhaṃq̍ rasEna̍ samasRukśhmahi|̍ payasvAṃ̍ agna A&gamaM̍ taM mAq saṃ sRuja̍ varcasA|̍ | vasur vasupatirq.̍ hikamasyagnE̍ viBAvasuH|̍ syAma# tE sumatAvapi|̍ | tvAmagnE̍ vasupatiM̍ ~MvasUnAmaBi̍ pra mandE-[̍ ] 53

verses.padam: (Padam) addhvarEśhu|̍ rAqjann| | tvayA̱| vAja̱m| vAqjayanta iti# vAja - yantaH|̍ jayEma| aBIti|̍ syAqma| pRuthsutIH| martyAnAm|̍ | tvAm| agnE| vAqjasAtamamiti̍# vAja - sAtamam|̍ viprA̱H| vardhanti| suśhTutamiti̍ su - stutam| | saH| naH| rAqsva| suvIryamiti# su - vIrya̱m| | ayam| naH| agniH| varivaH|̍ kRuṇOtU| ayam| mRudhaH|̍ puraH| Etu| praBindanniti# pra - Bindann| | ayam| śatrUn|̍ jayatu| jaṛ hRuśhAṇaH|̍ ayam| vAja̱m| jayatu| vAjasAtaviti̍ vAja-sAqtau|̍ | agninA̱| agniH| samiti|̍ iddhyatE| kaviH| gRuhapatiriti̍# gRuha - patiH| yuvA̱| | havyavADiti# havya - vAT| juhvA̱sya iti# juhu - AqsyaH| | tvam| hi| agnE ( )| agninA̱| vipraH|̍ viprEṇa|̍ sann| satA| | saKA̱| saKyA̱| samiddhyasa iti# sam - iddhyasE̱| | uditi|̍ agnE| śucayaH|̍ tava|̍ vIti|̍ jyOtiśhA|̍ | 54 (64) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 46 Anuvaakams : - (A dadE̍ - vAqcaspatayE̍ - upayAqmagRuhItO&syA-̍ vAyO̍ - ayaM ~MvAqM - ~MyAva̱M - prAtaryujA# - vayaM - taM - ~MyE dEvA̍ - striṃqśa TTa dupayAqmagRu̍hItO&sI̍ - mUrddhAnaM - madhuścE - ndrA̱gni - OmAsO̍ - marutvanta̍ - mindra# - marutvO - marutvA̱n - mahAn - mahAnnuvat - kadA - vAqma - madabdhEBi̍ rhiraṇyapAṇiṃ̍ - suśarmAq - bRuhaspati# sutasya - harirasya̍ - gna# - uttiśhThan̍ - taraṇi - rApyAyasvE̍ - yuśhTE yE - jyOtiśhmatIM̍ - prayAqsAya# - citta - mAtiśhThE - ndra - masAvi̍ - sarvasya̍ - mahAnth - sajOśhAq - udutyaM - dhAqtO - ruṃ hi - yastvAq śhaTcatvAriṃśat̍ ) KOrvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Pancaatis : - (A dadE̍ - yE dEvA̍ - mahA - nuttiśhThanth - sarvasya̍ - santu durmitrA - ścatuśhpa~jcAqśat|̍ ) First and Last Padam of Fourth Prasnam : - (A dadE̍ - vi jyOtiśhA|̍ )| | hariH̍ OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAThE prathamakAṇDE caturthaH praśnaH samAptaH| |
verses.samhita: - vi jyOtiśhA̍ >2 vijyOtiśhA̍ bRuhatA BA̱tyagnirAqvir viśvAni̍ kRuṇutE mahitvA| prAdEvIrmAqyAH̍ sahatE-durEvAqH̍ śiśItE̍ śRu~ggE rakśhasE̍ vinikśhE̱| (Tś1-2-14-7) ========================= OM namaH paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaH, śrI guruByO namaH| hariH OM| | 1. 5 prathamakAṇDE pa~jcamaH praśnaH - (punarAdhAnaM)
